item.description:
On July 25, 2006, the CCRI Roleplayer's Guild is going to host the second weekly Dungeons and Dragons campaign day, beginning at 12 noon and ending at 6-7PM. Players can expect to find adventure throughout the Elsir Vale, fight vicious goblinoids and dragonspawn, and roleplay with a myriad of supporting characters and players.

As the title indicates, we're following the WotC published adventure: "The Red Hand of Doom". As it stands, the party is close to finishing the first part of five. After arriving in the Elsir Vale, the group was ambushed by a small warband of hobgoblins, supported by a pair of summoned hellhounds. Quickly dispatching the raiders, the group arrived in Drellen's Ferry, and were speedily recruited to stop the continuing raids on the town. After hiring a guide, they made their way to Vraath Keep. Scouting ahead, they identified and killed the bugbear leader of the local warbands.

You can bring a 6th or 7th level character, using resources from the following rulebooks:

All 3.5 Core Rulebooks
Players Handbook 2
Dungeon Masters Guide 2
Forgotten Realms Campaign Setting
Magic of Faerun
Silver Marches
Spell Compendium
Eberron Campaign Setting
Sharn: The City of Towers
Races of Eberron
Complete Warrior
Complete Divine
Complete Arcane
Complete Adventurer
Heroes of Battle
Unearthed Arcana

If you want to play a unique or rare race, make sure to contact me beforehand. Otherwise, only things from the above books can be used. NO EXCEPTIONS!

Parking is normally found in the student lot, to the left of the main building. There is a guest parking area, but it's limited to 30 minutes only. RIPTA serves CCRI Warwick on the 22 and 30 routes from Kennedy Plaza in Providence.
